article.title: Raytheon Supports Advanced Targeting System for F/A-18
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Advanced Targeting Forward Looking Infrared System

article.text: Raytheon Company, McKinney, Texas, is being awarded $49,900,000 for ceiling priced repair delivery order 7000 under previously awarded basic ordering agreement for the repair of 40 weapons replaceable assembly/shop replaceable assembly for the Advanced Targeting Forward Looking Infrared System used in support of the F/A-18 aircraft.Â The Naval Supply Weapon Systems Support, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity.
